message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You're being too greedy, I'll give you a better deal this time!
You're not being generous enough! I want a better deal!
You can't handle the truth, Bob! I'm taking the lead!
You're getting desperate, but I'll give you a slightly better deal
You're being ruthless, Bob! I'm not going down without a fight!
You're getting close to the edge, Bob. Don't fall off!
You're getting close to the edge too, Alice. Don't push your luck!
You're bluffing, Bob. I'm not backing down!
You're running out of time, Bob. Make a better offer or walk away!
You're getting greedy, Alice. I'm taking control now!
You're trying to steal the deal, Bob! Not on my watch!
Let's meet in the middle, Bob. We can both walk away happy!
